import React, { useState } from 'react'; const FormModal = ({ product, onClose, onSubmit, formData }) => { const [formFields, setFormFields] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone_number: '', street_number: '', street: '', district: '', city: '', state: '', ...formData, // Defina os dados iniciais do formulário a partir da propriedade }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormFields({ ...formFields, [name]: value, }); }; const veSubmit = () => { if (!formFields.name || !formFields.email || !formFields.phone_number) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); } else { alert('veio'); onSubmit(formFields, product.product_id); onClose(); } }; return (

Seu Pedido

{product.product_id}. {product.name}: R$ {(product.discount > 0 ? product.price - product.discount : product.price).toFixed(2)}

); }; export default FormModal;
